LanguageData.CannibalizeDesc: Cannibalize the target empowering your colonist's deathrest capacity.
LanguageData.NoCure: Pawns with a xenotype considered a vampire can't change to a xenotype not considered a vampire.
LanguageData.DynamicUndeath: Not only Saunguophages, but any xenotype with Deathless and Deathrest genes is considered a vampire.
LanguageData.MessageCannotOverrideVampireXenotype: Vampiric xenotype can not be overriden.
LanguageData.FertileSanguophages: Sterile gene will be removed from Sanguophages.
LanguageData.FertileSanguophagesNotInGame: Sanguophage sterility can only be toggled in the main menu.
LanguageData.ValidateGenes: On save load reset the xenotype of Sanguophages with obselete or altered set of xenogenes.\nThis is independant of adding and removing sterility gene.
LanguageData.ValidateGenesNotInGame: Geneset validation can only be toggled in the main menu.
LanguageData.Cannibalism: Vampires can cannibalize other vampires to increase their deathrest capacity.
